name: GitHub Universe 2024 - The World's Fair of Software
content: The world's fair of software. Where AI and security transform the developer experience. • 3500+ Attendees • 150+ Speakers • 100+ Sessions • 35+ Featured partners Stay ahead, always • Learn directly from the experts and leaders driving our AI-powered future. • Be the first to learn about GitHub’s latest product innovations —and how to use them in your business. • Hear from leading organizations across industries including finance, healthcare, tech, and more. Foster team growth • Motivate your team with sessions on shifting security left and generative AI to help save time and achieve that flow state. • Learn from other teams at leading tech companies through product showcases and partner booths. • Practice skill-building and leadership with Q&A, interactive activities, and live exercises. Learn by doing • Visit the GitHub Expert Center for product guidance and demos. • Showcase your expertise and catch a glimpse of GitHub’s latest GitHub Copilot certification. • Learn best practices for secure software development in interactive workshops and sessions.
